node.title: Bikie gang member charged over Nick Martin murder and attempted killing of two others
node.alt: A man in a red singlet stands talking to another man who is wearing a bikie jacket.
node.description: A second man is charged in connection with the sniper-style murder ofÂ Rebels bikie boss Nick Martin in Perth last year.
node.content:
["WA Police have charged a second man over the sniper-style murder of Rebels bikie boss Nick Martin in Perth last year.", "Police allege the man paid another person to shoot\u00a0Martin as he watched a drag race with his family at the crowded Kwinana Motorplex in December 2020.", "The shooter \u2014 a 35-year-old Perth man who cannot be named due to a suppression order \u2014 has already pleaded guilty to\u00a0Martin's murder and will be sentenced in December.", "At the time, WA Police Deputy Commissioner Blanch said the investigation was not over and he was confident more people would be charged over the murder.", "The man charged today is a member of an outlaw motorcycle club and will appear in the Perth Magistrates Court tomorrow.\u00a0", "
Two others on murder list
", "The man has been charged with a number of other offences relating to different incidents, including:", "", "
Another man who admitted shooting\u00a0Nick Martin in a sniper-style attack was a volunteer with combat charity Shadows of Hope.(Supplied: Instagram)
", "It is alleged he offered the 35-year-old man money to kill a woman, as well as a senior member of an outlaw motorcycle gang living overseas.", "Martin's\u00a0shooting prompted police to set up a special taskforce to investigate with the codename Ravello, while the WA government offered a reward of $1 million for information.", "The murder also led to a crackdown by police on bikie gangs that included raids on premises across the metropolitan area and led to charges being laid against more than 100 people."]
